Package gameControl

Class gameController

java.lang.Object
gameControl.gameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
gameConstants, unoConstants
public class gameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements gameConstants
The gameController class serves as the main control of the game. This class sets the rules to be followed by players and controls.
